articles.title: Geylang murder case: 8-year-old victim was nice, would greet him when they met in lift, says neighbour - AsiaOne

articles.title: Breathing, talking and sneezing can spread Covid-19: NUS study - AsiaOne

articles.title: Liverpool can use Lionel Messi transfer to sneak his potential successor out of PSG - Liverpool.com
articles.description: With PSG forced to sell to accommodate their influx of superstars, including Lionel Messi, Liverpool can snatch their top young talent including fellow La Masia starlet in Xavi Simons.
